summary: Comprehensive testing of REALUM platform - Auth persistence fix verified, NPC AI Chat working, Seasonal Events Calendar working, Marketplace Inventory working. Backend: 21/24 tests passed (87.5%). Frontend: All pages load correctly with auth persistence.

minor.issue: Rate limiting (429) after 20 requests per minute - expected behavior but may affect UX during rapid testing

critical_code_review_comments: Auth persistence fix is working correctly - axios interceptors properly attach tokens from localStorage
Rate limiting is properly implemented (20 requests/minute) - good security practice

success_rate.backend: 87.5% (21/24 tests passed, 3 skipped due to fixture issues)
success_rate.frontend: 100% (all pages load and auth persists correctly)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Auth persistence bug is FIXED. All requested features are working: NPC AI Chat (with Emergent LLM key), Seasonal Events Calendar (26+ events), Marketplace Inventory endpoint. Rate limiting is active (20 req/min).

features_tested.auth_persistence: PASS - Login persists after page refresh and navigation between protected routes
features_tested.npc_ai_chat: PASS - POST /api/npc/ai-chat works with Emergent LLM key, returns AI responses from NPCs
features_tested.seasonal_events_calendar: PASS - GET /api/events/calendar returns 26+ events throughout the year with active/upcoming events
features_tested.marketplace_inventory: PASS - GET /api/inventory returns user's purchased items with categories
features_tested.dashboard: PASS - Shows user stats (RLM, XP, Level, Badges), Token Economy, Quick Actions, Objectives, Mini-Tasks
features_tested.navigation: PASS - All protected routes (Jobs, Marketplace, Dashboard) accessible after login without losing auth
features_tested.login_flow: PASS - Login form works, redirects to dashboard, shows intro/onboarding for new sessions

api_endpoints_verified.POST /api/auth/login: 200 OK - returns access_token and user data
api_endpoints_verified.GET /api/auth/me: 200 OK - returns user profile with token
api_endpoints_verified.POST /api/npc/ai-chat: 200 OK - returns AI response from NPC
